May 19, 2002 D Weston-super-Mare (Championship & First Section)
Weston-super-Mare (Championship & First Section) 1 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Weston-super-Mare Contest weston-super-mare-championship-first-section
Winter Gardens, Weston-super-Mare, Somerset, England, UK Prizes - 1st £200, 2nd £130, 3rd £100. 5 bands competed.
Nov. 22, 2010, 7:04 p.m. July 7, 2020, 12:58 p.m.
